name: 在线教育开发实习生 Elearning Development Intern
name_original: 在线教育开发实习生 Elearning Development Intern
description:
Wait, am I gaming?
No, you are learning...

'Elearning Development Intern' is a very casual simulation game where you will play as a new intern for an E-learning startup and experience very interesting (short/horrible/painful/ I want refund / annoying) internship life.
The game is full of randomness, so the customs clearance time is not equal.

Turn on your computer, have a cup of coffee, and work happily.
Read the materials, accept the guidance of the seniors and the test of the small BOSS.
Then I am promoted to a raise and go to life... you may have thought more.

Spoiler Warning: Although it is a technical post, you don't need any technical foundation at all.
Pain Warning: This game may contain hidden branches that force you to learn "joint probability matrix decomposition graph model", "binary differential evolution algorithm" and so on.
